summary: This bill, the Strengthening Wildfire Resiliency Through Satellites Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a grant program for monitoring wildfires using satellite technology. The program will provide grants to eligible entities to purchase and integrate high-resolution imaging capabilities and use the data for wildfire detection, assessment, and management. A report to Congress is required, and $20 million is authorized to be appropriated annually for fiscal years 2026-2028.
